FROMCUBE(6D)                                       FROMCUBE(6D)





NAME
       fromcube - convert a Cubicomp/Vertigo image file to IRIS
       format

SYNOPSIS
       fromcube cubicomp.pic outimage.rgb

DESCRIPTION
       fromcube converts a Cubicomp/Vertigo image file into  an
       Iris image file format.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004              FROMCUBE(6D)
